thing-type.label: Tecalor heat pump THZ 5.5 7.62
thing-type.description: Tecalor heat pump for THZ connecting via serial USB/RS232 interface to firmware version 7.62.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Portname
parameter.description: Serial port to use connecting to the heat pump device e.g. COM1 for Windows and /dev/ttyS0 or /dev/ttyUSB0 for Linux.

parameter.name: baudRate
parameter.label: Baud rate
parameter.description: Baud rate of the serial interface.

parameter.name: waitingTime
parameter.label: Waiting time between requests
parameter.description: Time between polling requests in [ms], it depends on the speed of the heat pump CPU and interface .

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Heat pump refresh rate
parameter.description: Refresh rate in [s] to query the meter data.
